Author: jasonabis#8549
Content: hello, is any support available?

Author: Hermes#6934
Content: Hi there

Author: jasonabis#8549
Content: hello!

Author: Hermes#6934
Content: How can we help you?

Author: jasonabis#8549
Content: i am trying to start barterdex. put in my passphrase and it has been loading for 5 minutes.

Author: jasonabis#8549
Content: Starting BarterDEX. Please wait.

Author: Hermes#6934
Content: Please take a look at this guide and let us know if this guide helps https://support.komodoplatform.com/solution/articles/29000024459-barterdex-loading-issues/en

Author: jasonabis#8549
Content: okie doke

Author: jasonabis#8549
Content: so far, no go. i only deleted the cache folder though and relaunched.

Author: jasonabis#8549
Content: cannot find the user data folder.

Author: jasonabis#8549
Content: i've not successfully loaded it before.

Author: Hermes#6934
Content: You are using a 64 bit PC right? Which Os you have  and which Barterdex version you are using?

Author: jasonabis#8549
Content: yes. windows 8.1 and 1.1.2-rc

Author: Hermes#6934
Content: If you have never been able to launch it, then it could be related maybe to an AV not letting market maker to be launched. Can you go to the Task manager and see if when you launch Barterdex Marketmaker.exe is showed in the processes tab?

Author: jasonabis#8549
Content: it shows under apps and twice under background processes

Author: Hermes#6934
Content: Try killing the process close barterdex and relaunch it...it could be that you have already the process running in the background

Author: jasonabis#8549
Content: i ended all 3 tasks. as soon as i opened the app again, the two showed up under background and the one showed up under apps

Author: Hermes#6934
Content: Ok if you don't have any pending swap or stuck swap you can proceed on by erasing the Barterdex folder inside %appdata%/Roaming as it's showed in the past guide

Author: Hermes#6934
Content: after you do this try relaunching again and let us know if this helps

Author: jasonabis#8549
Content: i deleted that folder and relaunched. i didn't look at the past guide. is that all i needed to do?

Author: jasonabis#8549
Content: it will stay starting barterdex and show me those revolving circles forever. if i click reload under the view tab, it will let me put in or generate a new passphrase. but once i try to log in, revolving circles again.

Author: Hermes#6934
Content: This a little bit strange haven't seen this issue with the new version while launching it , just in case which coin are you wanting to trade? You can also try using Hyperdex it uses Barterdex same marketmaker but is more stable for new users...maybe you can find your trade there https://github.com/atomiclabs/hyperdex/releases Here is the link

Author: jasonabis#8549
Content: I wasn't really looking to trade. MGNX got listed on barterdex and I just wanted to check it out.

Author: jasonabis#8549
Content: curious if it is trading much and if so, what price.

Author: jasonabis#8549
Content: should the net id be 0 and seed node ip be blank?

Author: Hermes#6934
Content: those configurations for your case don't need to be changed...can you please send us your PC specs and also a possible screenshot of the toggle developers tools options , and specifically into the Console and Network tab of those options at support@komodoplatform.com to see if there are any more errors,   You may see the orderbooks inside Barterdex live with this link if you would like to see if there are any MGNX orders ...here is the link  @jasonabis https://www.atomicexplorer.com/#/books

Author: jasonabis#8549
Content: Thanks and will do
